***Install software:***

You will need to install the latest version of R and RStudio before class starts. Note that if you have any restrictions on your work computer, you might need to work with your IT department to get R and RStudio installed.

Please follow these directions: https://jhudatascience.org/intro_to_r/docs/module_details/day0.html.
